objects.text:
X-Trans CMOS Sensor • Classic Design • Manual Controls
Interchangeable Lenses • Built-in Wi-Fi • Advanced Autofocus

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• Premium build quality with durable metal construction
• Multiple manual control dials for precise shooting settings
• High-performance interchangeable lens system
• Electronic viewfinder for accurate composition
• Tiltable LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Advanced autofocus system for sharp captures
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens lineup
• Compact and lightweight body ideal for travel photography
• Film simulation modes for creative photography

banner_details:
This promotional banner presents a sleek and minimalist product advertisement for a camera. At the top, the "heading" text layer highlights the product name in large, bold white typography. Directly underneath it, the "tagline" layer uses a striking red font to communicate a compelling selling point. Central to the design is a realistic "product_image" of the camera, placed prominently to draw attention. Beneath the image, the "description" text layer presents key features in bullet-point format. The "price" layer showcases the cost in bold red, and the "cta_button" rectangle paired with the "cta" text layer emphasizes urgency with a call-to-action.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: `#1a1a1a`
- Deep Steel Blue: `#2a3445`
- Light Slate Blue: `#3d4a5c`
- Bright Red (Accent): `#e74c3c`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features the Fujifilm X-T10 camera, predominantly showcasing a minimalist and professional color palette. The primary color is a matte black (#1C1C1C), used across the body, creating a sleek and modern look. Accents of white (#FFFFFF) are used for the branding and dial labels, providing high contrast and readability. Additional highlights include metallic silver (#C0C0C0) on the lens rings and dials, and subtle red-orange (#FF4500) details around focus indicators, adding vibrancy without overpowering. The lens reflects hints of emerald green (#50C878) and gold (#FFD700), creating a dynamic visual appeal. This palette is ideal for a premium, bold advertisement banner.
